data.title: News Release : Oct. 12, 2023 "Two Special Editions of Nintendo Switch Lite with the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game Downloaded to be Released on November 3, 2023"
data.meta_description: Press release of Nintendo Co., Ltd.
data.text:
Nintendo Co., Ltd. (HQ: Kyoto, Minami-ku, Japan; Representative Director and President: Shuntaro Furukawa) will release Nintendo Switch Lite Isabelleâs Aloha Edition â Animal Crossing: New Horizons Bundle and Nintendo Switch Lite Timmy & Tommyâs Aloha Edition â Animal Crossing: New Horizons Bundle featuring a special design inspired by Animal Crossing: New Horizons, at a manufacturer's suggested retail price of 22,980 yen (including tax) .

The coral colored Nintendo Switch Lite Isabelleâs Aloha Edition â Animal Crossing: New Horizons Bundle, and the turquoise colored Nintendo Switch Lite Timmy & Tommyâs Aloha Edition â Animal Crossing: New Horizons Bundle will both have the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game downloaded to the system, which allows the player to start playing the game without purchasing the game individually.

The Nintendo Switch Lite is lightweight, compact and designed exclusively for handheld play with its controllers built right into the system.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons is the latest entry of the Animal Crossing series which was released in March 2020. Enter a deserted island where the time of day and season match real life, and can enjoy anything you wish, from interacting with the animal residents, to fishing, hunting down insects, gardening, decorating your room, etc.

Product Overview

Product names

Nintendo Switch Lite Isabelleâs Aloha Edition â Animal Crossing: New Horizons Bundle

Nintendo Switch Lite Timmy & Tommyâs Aloha Edition â Animal Crossing: New Horizons Bundle

Release date Friday, November 3, 2023 MSRP 22,980 yen (including tax) Publisher Nintendo Copyright Â© Nintendo

For more information on Nintendo Switch Lite, please visit our product page below.

https://www.nintendo.co.jp/hardware/detail/switch-lite/index.html

To ensure that your child can play Nintendo Switch safely, we offer Nintendo Switch Parental Controls mobile app for parents and guardians. For details, please visit our website.
